attributes.action: demand police arrest all bankers and corrupt politicians
attributes.additional_details:
ARREST ALL BANKERS AND POLITICIANS AND PROTECT THE PEOPLE FROM COLLECTIVE PUNISHMENT OF AUSTERITY,STARVATION AND FORCED POVERTY
our government are charged under common law by me.
“Cruelty to animals” in that denial of offered free food to hungry British citizens, has caused and is still causing unnecessary human suffering and is cruel in the unnecessary risk to life and the offenders being aware of the cruelty and suffering.
“Crimes against the persons” in that, government directives to the DWP  staff have resulted in the suicides of 11000 human beings to date.
“Crimes against humanity” in the forced collective austerity on the population for the criminal activities of the banking professionals.
our people are paying for the crimes of the bankers and with poverty, starvation and austerity, WE ARE THE VICTIMS.
jsa.
